explains: adj. 赤道的，近赤道的；中纬线的
wordGroup: equatorial guinea n. 赤道几内亚（西非国家）

sentences.en: In the equatorial mountains the low growth form is less prevalent.
sentences.cn: 在赤道山区，低生长形态较不普遍。

sentences.en: They appear only in equatorial regions and generally do not form extensive interconnected networks.
sentences.cn: 它们只出现在赤道地区，一般不会形成广泛的相互连通的网络。

sentences.en: It is this irreversibly modified world, from the polar caps to the equatorial forests, that is all the nature we have.
sentences.cn: 从极地盖帽到赤道森林，这是不可逆转的世界，这就是我们拥有的所有自然。
